definition: individual soldier/(literary) isolated military unit, cut off from reinforcements

sentences.english: Electronic apparels of individual soldier can achieve the purpose of improving the soldiers' integrative battle effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 單兵信息化服裝能提高單兵的綜合作戰效能。

sentences.english: Electronic apparels of individual soldier can achieve the purpose of improving the soldiers' integrative battle effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 單兵信息化服裝能提高單兵的綜合作戰效能。

sentences.english: The electronic collimation device is a part of radar command system.
sentences.chinese: 電子瞄準鏡是單兵導彈雷達指揮系統的一部分。

sentences.english: They must be well-trained in individual tactics and combat skills.
sentences.chinese: 他們必須在單兵戰術和作戰技能上訓練有素。

sentences.english: The development of sophisticated combat equipments for individual soldiers in the postindustrial era is described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了信息化時代單兵綜合作戰裝備的發展。
